node_info.description: Reads and writes data from a spreadsheet file like CSV, XLS, ODS, etc
node_info.name: spreadsheetFile

generic.label: Build your own virtual assistant with n8n: A step by step guide

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Reads data from a spreadsheet file
properties.action: Read data from a spreadsheet file

options.name: Read From File
options.description: Reads data from a spreadsheet file
options.action: Read data from a spreadsheet file

options.description: Writes the workflow data to a spreadsheet file
options.action: Write data to a spreadsheet file

options.description: Comma-separated values

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the input field containing the file data to be processed

properties.name: options
properties.description: Set the field delimiter, usually a comma

options.name: delimiter
options.description: Set the field delimiter, usually a comma

options.name: enableBOM
options.description: Whether to detect and exclude the byte-order-mark from the CSV Input if present

options.name: relaxQuotes
options.description: Whether to handle unclosed quotes in CSV fields as part of the field's content instead of throwing a parsing error

options.name: headerRow
options.description: Whether the first row of the file contains the header names

options.name: includeEmptyCells
options.description: Whether to include empty cells when reading from file. They will be filled with an empty string.

options.displayName: Max Number of Rows to Load
options.name: maxRowCount
options.description: Stop handling records after the requested number of rows are read. Use -1 if you want to load all rows.

options.name: range
options.description: The range to read from the table. If set to a number it will be the starting row. If set to string it will be used as A1-style notation range.

options.name: rawData
options.description: Whether to return RAW data, instead of parsing it

options.name: readAsString
options.description: In some cases and file formats, it is necessary to read as string to ensure special characters are interpreted correctly

options.name: sheetName
options.description: Name of the sheet to read from in the spreadsheet (if supported). If not set, the first one will be chosen.

options.name: fromLine
options.description: Start handling records from the requested line number. Starts at 0.

options.name: skipRecordsWithErrors
options.description: Whether to skip records with errors when reading from file

values.name: enabled
values.description: Whether to skip records with errors when reading from file

values.name: maxSkippedRecords
values.description: The maximum number of records that can be skipped, will throw an error if exceeded. Set to -1 to remove limit.

options.description: Comma-separated values

properties.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

properties.name: options
properties.description: Whether compression will be applied or not

options.name: compression
options.description: Whether compression will be applied or not

options.name: fileName
options.description: File name to set in binary data. By default will "spreadsheet.<fileFormat>" be used.

options.name: headerRow
options.description: Whether the first row of the file contains the header names

options.name: sheetName
options.description: Name of the sheet to create in the spreadsheet

hints.text: The name of the input field containing the file data to be processed
The name of the output binary field to put the file in

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Stop Workflow
options.description: Halt execution and fail workflow

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
